title: Riding your bicycle [Junior Road Safety Series Episode 6]
creator_contributor_role: Kenneth S Cox Productions, production company
Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Safety education, Industrial
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Road safety
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Traffic safety and children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Traffic safety
abstract: The fun and dangers of bicycle riding are shown in this film, and firm safety rules are established and demonstrated for all bicycle riders.
description: Made in 1971, this training film from the Commonwealth Film Unit is particularly interesting due to the lack of helmets and lycra we see everywhere on the road in 2014. The film teaches people how to ride safely and to try and avoid accidents by showing some examples of cycling gone wrong. Source: NFSA Film Australia Collection.
